iti29:2.1_1: dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu diṭṭheva dhamme sukhaṁ viharati avighātaṁ anupāyāsaṁ apariḷāhaṁ;
iti29:2.2_0: kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugati pāṭikaṅkhā.
iti29:2.4_0: Indriyesu guttadvāratāya ca, bhojane mattaññutāya ca.
iti29:2.5_1: dvīhi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu diṭṭheva dhamme sukhaṁ viharati avighātaṁ anupāyāsaṁ apariḷāhaṁ;
iti29:2.6_0: kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugati pāṭikaṅkhā”ti.
iti29:6.1_0: Ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti.
